summary: The implementation delivers a complete developer portfolio website that addresses all 10 requirements with professional design, animations, and structure. All major sections (Hero, About, Skills, Projects, Resume, Contact) are implemented with appropriate scroll animations and hover effects. The design uses a neutral gray palette with emerald accent color, Inter typography, and modern minimal aesthetic. However, there are minor discrepancies in navigation hover effects implementation and the use of OKLCH color system instead of more standard color formats.

hallucinated_features.description: OKLCH color system implementation in CSS
hallucinated_features.reason: The color system uses OKLCH format (e.g., '0.65 0.15 160' for accent color) which is a newer CSS color space. While functional, this was not specified in requirements which called for a 'neutral base color palette plus one accent color' without prescribing implementation details. Standard hex or RGB would be more conventional.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity and backend authentication infrastructure
hallucinated_features.reason: Multiple authentication-related hooks and imports (useInternetIdentity, useActor, AuthClient) are present despite non-goals explicitly stating 'User authentication or login functionality' and 'Backend data persistence' should not be included.

React Query (TanStack Query) infrastructure is implemented with QueryClient setup, but the portfolio uses only static content with no backend data fetching needs. The useQueries.ts file is intentionally empty acknowledging this.

hallucinated_features.description: Caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking in footer
hallucinated_features.reason: Footer includes branded attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM parameters and dynamic app identifier generation. This branding was not requested in the BuildRequest.
